data.lyric:
[ti:Killer]
[ar:Kali Uchis]
[al:Isolation]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Killer (Explicit) - Kali Uchis
[00:17.51]Baby have you got no soul
[00:23.14]
[00:24.07]Is your heart a gaping hole
[00:29.25]
[00:31.15]How come I didn't see that in you
[00:36.28]
[00:37.97]How come I can forgive you
[00:43.37]
[00:46.00]And if you loved me you'd never do this
[00:50.34]
[00:51.74]No if you loved me you wouldn't put me through it
[00:56.71]
[00:57.45]That makes you a killer a killer a killer
[01:03.47]
[01:04.23]That makes you a killer a killer a killer
[01:10.39]
[01:13.70]Forever is for dreamers for dreamers
[01:18.28]And it's foolish to not know you're a schemer
[01:23.93]
[01:25.76]It's silly to think of our unborn children
[01:31.09]
[01:31.77]'Cause all I'm thinking about right now is how I'll never know 'em
[01:37.86]
[01:40.93]And if you loved me you would never do this
[01:44.88]
[01:46.36]Our future's battered and bloody you're so f**king ruthless
[01:52.19]That makes you a killer a killer a killer
[01:58.31]
[01:59.06]That makes you a killer a killer a killer
[02:05.12]
[02:05.73]That makes you a killer a killer a killer
[02:12.10]
[02:12.84]That makes you a killer that makes you a killer
data.trans:
[ti:Killer]
[ar:Kali Uchis]
[al:Isolation]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:17.51]宝贝你是不是没有灵魂
[00:23.14]
[00:24.07]你的心是空洞的吗
[00:29.25]
[00:31.15]我怎么没有看出来
[00:36.28]
[00:37.97]我怎能原谅你
[00:43.37]
[00:46.00]若你爱我你就不会这般
[00:50.34]
[00:51.74]若你爱我你就不会让我经历苦难
[00:56.71]
[00:57.45]这只能说明你是感情扼杀者
[01:03.47]
[01:04.23]这只能说明你是感情扼杀者
[01:10.39]
[01:13.70]厮守永远只存在空想家心中
[01:18.28]我是如此愚蠢竟不知道你是一个感情骗子
[01:23.93]
[01:25.76]我是如此愚蠢我想到我们逝去的孩子
[01:31.09]
[01:31.77]因为现在我只想到为何我从未发觉呢
[01:37.86]
[01:40.93]若你爱我你就不会这般
[01:44.88]
[01:46.36]我们的未来已坍塌 你是这般无情
[01:52.19]这只能说明你是感情扼杀者
[01:58.31]
[01:59.06]这只能说明你是感情扼杀者
[02:05.12]
[02:05.73]这只能说明你是感情扼杀者
[02:12.10]
[02:12.84]这只能说明你是感情扼杀者
